refnamediv.refpurpose: programs to extract translatable strings from OCaml source file.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the ocaml-xgettext

ocaml-xgettext is a camlp4 toplevel. This toplevel is compiled with the printer module pr_gettext.cmo. It outputs an OCaml marshalled data structure that can only be understood by ocaml-gettext. The purpose of this program is to be a backend for OCaml source code string extraction. You should not use it directly.
